document_data.name: Olloa
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Olloa''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''If all these folks can just keep their shit together, maybe nobody else will get hurt. Maybe.''|Fist Olloa}}
document_data.Description: Olloa had a tanned complexion with black hair gathered in a bun. She wore a set of [[leather armor]] as part of her Flaming Fist uniform and was armed with a deadly [[heavy crossbow]]. Olloa had a strict and somewhat cruel personality.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Olloa was tasked with patrolling the Lower City, near the [[Basilisk Gate]]. She and her fellow patrolmen had no qualms with shutting protesters up with force.
